main event: A ground observer in Gibson City, Illinois, reported seeing a round red light in the sky that appeared like a searchlight but was stationary and suddenly disappeared while the observer was driving to work.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 15 minutes,The observer was an instructor in the jet engine branch,The object was described as round and light bulb-shaped,It was believed to be the light from a newly installed microwave relay tower,The sighting occurred around 0215Z at dawn.
sighted object: a round red light in the sky
witness description: civilian instructor in jet engine branch
